channel.title: Argh! Moparscape/Testscape .bat file trouble
channel.description:
I can no longer open Moparscape.bat (the one that opens mopar) or runserver.bat (in testscape source folder)
My computer froze while using Mopar and playing on Testscape and when I restarted that screwed it up apparently and now I can no longer open them.
Help! :(
This is on my brand new custom built laptop that I got for christmas (I'm 19 years old) and it's got Windows XP Home and I recently downloaded Java Environment 6.0 and the other thing needed to make your own server (6.0)
I tried making my own server but ended up on "Testscape" and loved it.
OFF TOPIC:
Does anyone have a list of commands for Mopar (the Aryan types "::<insert here>") I found some not listed like: - ::emote <insert number> <= Very glitchy, causes player to do weird glitchy emotes and never stop until logout. - ::mod < 0, 1 or 2> (0=Player, 1: Player Mod, 2: Jagex Mod) Player type.

item.title: Argh! Moparscape/Testscape .bat file trouble
item.dc:creator: @ImmortalKaine ImmortalKaine
item.description:
@ImmortalKaine wrote:

I can no longer open Moparscape.bat (the one that opens mopar) or runserver.bat (in testscape source folder)

My computer froze while using Mopar and playing on Testscape and when I restarted that screwed it up apparently and now I can no longer open them.

Help!

This is on my brand new custom built laptop that I got for christmas (I’m 19 years old) and it’s got Windows XP Home and I recently downloaded Java Environment 6.0 and the other thing needed to make your own server (6.0)

I tried making my own server but ended up on “Testscape” and loved it.

OFF TOPIC:

Does anyone have a list of commands for Mopar (the Aryan types “::”) I found some not listed like:

  • ::emote <= Very glitchy, causes player to do weird glitchy emotes and never stop until logout.
  • ::mod < 0, 1 or 2> (0=Player, 1: Player Mod, 2: Jagex Mod) Player type.

Read full topic
